snippet: Ms. Franklin successfully blocked the Telluride Film Festival’s highly anticipated screening of “Amazing Grace” with a last-minute injunction.
abstract: Aretha Franklin sues to halt Telluride Film Festival from showing Sydney Pollack's posthumous documentary Amazing Grace, which depicts making of her 1970s album.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY

lead_paragraph: Ms. Franklin successfully blocked the Telluride Film Festival’s highly anticipated screening of “Amazing Grace” with a last-minute injunction.

headline.main: Aretha Franklin Thwarts Screening of Documentary Featuring Concert Footage
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Aretha Franklin Sues to Stop Screening of Documentary
